component.name: Total Chaos Retro Edition
component.summary: Survival horror set on a remote island known as Fort Oasis

description.p: Survival horror set on a remote island known as Fort Oasis. The island was once run by a community of coal miners which one day suddenly disappeared. Something, clearly, has gone very wrong with this place. Upon your arrival at Fort Oasis, you receive a strange radio transmission. Someone wants to be found. Survive in 6 chapters, against over 8 horrifying fiends with a large assortment of weapons.
Retro Edition has reduced texture resolution and poly-counts for improved performance. Save files from other versions of Total Chaos are not compatible.
